subject: statistics
title: Method of Moments in Point Estimation
contentHtml:
The method of moments is a popular approach to point estimation in statistical inference.

Given a probability distribution with unknown parameters, we can use the method of moments to estimate these parameters by matching the first few moments (e.g., mean, variance) of the observed data to those of the theoretical distribution.
